question: Convert to reported speech: 'I will submit my assignment tomorrow,' said the student.
options: The student said that he will submit his assignment tomorrow.
The student said that he would submit his assignment the next day.
The student said that I will submit my assignment tomorrow.
The student said that he will submit his assignment the next day.
explanation: In reported speech, 'will' changes to 'would', 'I' changes to 'he', 'my' changes to 'his', and 'tomorrow' changes to 'the next day'.
